document_data.Description: Tarr was a large, musclebound man with a bushy red beard.
document_data.History: Tarr and five other noblemen were part of an informal group who secretly debated the [[Obarskyr]] succession and who they should support until they were killed by an unknown assassin in a seedy tavern in [[Suzail]].
